headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: ad_ids
parameters.description: The list of ad IDs. Quantity: 1-100.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: ad_review_map
fields.description: Review data at the ad level.

fields.name: ad_id
fields.description: The ad ID.

fields.name: is_approved
fields.description: Whether the ad has been approved or not.

fields.name: review_status
fields.description: The ad review status. Enum values： ALL_AVAILABLE : The ad has been reviewed and can be delivered. PART_AVAILABLE : The ad has been reviewed and can only be delivered to some of the specified targeting countries. UNAVAILABLE : The ad has been reviewed and cannot be delivered.

fields.name: appeal_status To-be-deprecated
fields.description: Ad appeal status. Note : The value of this field will always be null.

fields.name: forbidden_placements
fields.description: The placements that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Ad Management - Placement .

fields.name: forbidden_ages
fields.description: The audience age ranges that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Audience Age Range .

fields.name: forbidden_locations
fields.description: The targeted regions that failed the review. For enum values, see Appendix - location codes .

fields.name: forbidden_operation_systems
fields.description: The audience operating systems that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Audience Operating System .

fields.name: last_audit_time
fields.description: Note : The value of this field will always be null. The last time when the ad was reviewed.

fields.name: reject_info
fields.description: Details about the rejection.

fields.name: suggestion
fields.description: The review suggestion.

fields.name: reasons
fields.description: The list of rejection reasons.

fields.name: forbidden_ages
fields.description: The audience age ranges that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Audience Age Range .

fields.name: forbidden_locations
fields.description: The targeted regions that failed the review. For enum values, see Appendix - location codes .

fields.name: forbidden_placements
fields.description: The placements that failed the review. For enum values, see Enumeration - Placement .

fields.name: content_info
fields.description: The content of the ad that has been reviewed.

fields.name: image_content
fields.description: The image content.

fields.name: image_id
fields.description: The ID of the image that has been reviewed.

fields.name: video_content
fields.description: The video content that has been reviewed.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: The ID of the video that is being reviewed.

fields.name: text_content
fields.description: The text.

fields.name: content_type
fields.description: The type of the content that has been reviewed， Enum values： MODE_STRING ， MODE_IMAGE ， MODE_VIDEO , MODE_CAROUSEL_MUSIC (Music in the Carousel Ads).

fields.name: carousel_music_content
fields.description: Returned when content_type is MODE_CAROUSEL_MUSIC . The content of the music in the Carousel Ads that has been reviewed.

fields.name: music_id
fields.description: The ID of the piece of music used in the Carousel Ads.
